mapper.select: select ur.roleId from tb_system_user u left join tb_system_user_role ur on u.id=ur.userId left join tb_system_role r on r.id=ur.roleId where u.username=#{username}
select f.name,f.url from tb_system_role r left join tb_system_role_function rf on r.id=rf.roleId left join tb_system_function f on f.id=rf.funcId where r.id=#{id}
